body:
$SPY $QQQ   after noticed the Billions and Billions of Darkpool sells and PUTs, price has directly hit old strong flat cloud equilibrium leve without any bounce for a 5 wave move. now looks like corrective A B C move which would mean a 5 wave bounce back to cloud magnet.  
 
price EXTREMELY far from future flat cloud equilibirum magnet. FED rate hikes months away. expect the unexpected for a blow off top concert..   tickets selling out!!   
 
$AAPL

body:
$SPY $DIA    dropped directly to strong flat cloud equilibirum level without any retrace for a 5 wave drop. now looks like corrective ABC move.. price extremly far from cloud equilibirum after high volume..  rate hikes months away so one more high not off table!   ichimoku cloud ahead can come quick..   
 
#Glazed 
$AAPL
$PTON Draftkings should make odds for which company’s will acquire who. My top contenders are: $AAPL $BRK.A $BLK

$SPY $SPX   the rare #pinkPanther Megaphone 
 
 
the call for drop after seeing the massive Darkpool and PUTs at the top was correct.Now,  it has hit the flat cloud levels that should be respected until broken. it has reached an important equilibirum support level on massive volume. i initially thought a bounce up to cloud before final drop in a 5 wave move. it didnt bounce ,so now am suspecting it was just a corrective ABC move and can quickly bounce back to retest cloud magnet ahead.  the FED interest rate hikei s now likely   months away. China Cut rates. Europe ECB Pres Ms Largarde said rate hike not anytime soon.  soo pumping seems like the next option here.. caution for extreme bounce as i saw some interesting CALLS ..   
 
$AAPL
$XLK $AAPL Apple has zero in common with Netflix. 🤡
